text: 11:21 Isa 23:1-18; Eze 26:1–28:26; Joel 3:4-8; Amos 1:9-10; Zec 9:2-4 “He Chorazin, nangdi awabanida! He Bethsaida, nangdi awabanida! Maramdi nakhoida toukhiba angakpa thabaksing adu Tyre amadi Sidon-da touramlabadi makhoina thinthadabamakhei pukning hongduna, pap tourubagi ningngamdaba adu utnabagidamak bora phi settuna masada ut chaikhatlamgadabani.
